transcript: the mole, watched him. She smiled, hid her face in her handkerchief, and remained with it hidden for awhile; then look- ing up and seeing Pierre she again began to laugh. She evidently felt unable to look at him without laughing, but could not resist looking at him: so to be out of temptation she slipped quietly behind one of the columns.
